title: The Cult of Scientism LIVE from University of Missouri Kansas City
itunes:title: The Cult of Scientism LIVE from University of Missouri Kansas City
description:
Charlie delivers remarks LIVE at the University of Missouri Kansas City as part of Turning Point USA's "Live Free Tour." Charlie delivers a critique of the "cult of scientism" and addresses the criticism many progressives make of conservatives believing they "don't believe in science." Charlie addresses the philosophical difference between believing in science, and believing in scientism, an all encompassing ideology. Complete with a full Q+A from students, listen to why the pandemic, transhumanism, and the rise of the fourth governmental branch of scientism technocrats all make this discussion more important than ever before. 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
